Posts.Content: Still_Beautiful wrote: I have a medium size light spot on my left cheek and I started the Taxol and Herceptin treatment and I was wondering if that may be the cause of this spot. Did anyone get light spots during these treatment or any other chemo treatment? Still_Beautiful Dx 2/10/2011, Stage IA, 4/12 nodes, ER+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: DID ANYONE GET LIGHT SPOTS ON FACE DURING CHEMO? Still_Beautiful Letlet
